about_the_game:
Explore the enchanting world of "Path of the Midnight Sun" in a whole new way with this 187-page artbook! Filled with never-before-seen concept art, sketches, and designs, each turn of the page will take you on a journey of discovery, revealing the secrets behind the stunning visuals that brought this game to life.

Note: After purchasing the game, find the artbook in the installation folder by right-clicking on the game icon in your Steam Library, selecting Properties, and then Local Files.

This artbook is not just a collector's item but a love letter to the game, showcasing the hard work and passion that went into crafting its unique aesthetics. For those who prefer to have a physical copy, the artbook has been designed to be fully printable and can be enjoyed just like a booklet.
It's also a great way to support the small team that developed "Path of the Midnight Sun"!

content_descriptors.notes:
Alcohol Reference
Animated Blood
Violence
Partial Nudity
Hot Springs Nudity

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows 7 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel N4100 (or similar) or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: -
  • Additional Notes: You will find the artbook in Local Files. More info in the description.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Dive deeper into the enchanting world of "Path of the Midnight Sun" with this 187-page artbook! Filled with never-before-seen concept art, sketches, and designs, this is your chance to own a piece of the game's stunning aesthetics. Support the devs with this exclusive collector's item today!
